self_predictions.prediction_summary: Matt believes he will dominate Frank, teaching him a lesson and giving him a rude awakening.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Top-roll battle, likely going to straps.

Frank Lamparelli.strength: Experienced top-roller, similar style to Matt.
Frank Lamparelli.health: Healthy, no pain, but getting older.
Frank Lamparelli.previous_match_summary: Frank has competed in many tournaments but fewer supermatches outside Italy.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Matt thinks Ongarbaev's versatility and maneuverability will give him the edge over Todd's side pressure.

Todd Hutchings.previous_match_summary: Todd has been dominant but may struggle against Ongarbaev's adaptability.

Kydyrgali Ongarbaev.previous_match_summary: Ongarbaev has improved significantly and is one of the smartest arm wrestlers.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Matt believes Devon is on a different level now and will adjust to Denis's strength, though Denis may surprise him.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Devon's versatility vs. Denis's raw power.

Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon has been on a warpath since his loss to Gennady.

Denis Cyplenkov.strength: Strong but not at his peak.
Denis Cyplenkov.previous_match_summary: Denis may not be as strong as he used to be.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Frank sees the match as even, acknowledging Matt's strength and demeanor.

Matt Mask.previous_match_summary: Matt has been performing well recently, looking healthier and more confident.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Frank believes Ivan's hooking ability will dominate Kamil's flopper press.

Ivan Matyushenko.strength: One of the best hook pullers.
Ivan Matyushenko.previous_match_summary: Ivan has dominated in past matches, including against Vitaly Laletin.

Kamil Jablonski.previous_match_summary: Kamil is strong but may struggle against Ivan's hook.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Frank thinks Denis's strength and endurance will edge out Devon's versatility.

Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon has been improving and is highly adaptable.

Denis Cyplenkov.strength: Very strong, but endurance is key.
Denis Cyplenkov.previous_match_summary: Denis is a formidable opponent but may not be at his peak.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin hopes John will win despite Sasho's strong form.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Sasho's hook vs. John's hand control.

Sasho Andreev.previous_match_summary: Sasho has been performing well recently.

John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: John has been vulnerable to inside pulls but remains a legend.
